Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine red-brown. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '156'. Name Aleximachos. Same die is used for an example in the Epigraphic Museum, Athens, and Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum (ABC 0045.45).
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (14)
